scripts.start:ai: start cmd /k "cd ai && venv\Scripts\activate && python ai_server.py"
scripts.start:all: npm run start:frontend && npm run start:backend && npm run start:ai
scripts.dev: concurrently -n FRONT,BACK,AI -c green,blue,magenta "cd frontend && npm start" "cd backend && npm start" "cd ai && venv\Scripts\activate && python ai_server.py"
